speaker: dog
dialog: bark bark, woof, woof woof-woof. Woof woof!

speaker: dog
dialog: and i can also speak english too if you'd rather listen to that!

speaker: dog
dialog: I don't think I can live with ya dismissing your friend so easily! (Listen to me, my time is more finite than yours!)

speaker: dog
dialog: With each second of mine being relative to seven of yours, I've figured early on that I need to be present in every moment.

speaker: dog
dialog: I've found that if not for others, I would not be me, and need to give my loves the time and understanding that they give to me.

speaker: dog
dialog: You always ask me who's a good boy, and although I'm sure it's me, I'm also sure that it won't be you if you don't show some love to your friend.

speaker: dog
dialog: It's been three days, twenty-one for me! It's been long enough, I think it's time for y'all to have that talk.

speaker: dog
dialog: Also, it's been three days please take me out for a walk.

speaker: dog
dialog: thank u, ily always, be the best u <3
